name: wayback_search
description: Look up a URL on the Wayback Machine calendar view. Returns capture history summary and snapshot availability for the given URL.

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: URL to look up in the Wayback Machine (e.g. 'example.com', 'https://example.com/page')

steps.code: const snapshots = document.querySelector('#wb-calendar, .calendar-grid, .calendar, [class*="CalendarMonth"]')?.textContent?.trim()?.slice(0, 500) || ''; const sparkline = document.querySelector('.sparkline-container, [class*="captures"], [class*="capture-count"], .captures-range-info')?.textContent?.trim() || ''; return { url_searched: '{{query}}', calendar_summary: snapshots, captures_info: sparkline, page_url: window.location.href };
steps.name: search_results
steps.label: Extract results
